name: oauth-passport
description: MCP-compliant OAuth 2.1 authorization server for WordPress. Provides secure OAuth functionality for WordPress applications, enabling third-party authentication and API access control with full Model Context Protocol support.
author: Automattic

scripts.plugin-zip:build: composer install --no-dev && pnpm run build && pnpm run plugin-zip
scripts.test: wp-env run tests-wordpress bash -c "cd /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/OAuthPassport && vendor/bin/phpunit --configuration phpunit-wp-env.xml"
scripts.test:coverage: wp-env run tests-wordpress bash -c "cd /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/OAuthPassport && vendor/bin/phpunit --configuration phpunit-wp-env.xml --coverage-html coverage"
